definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: in Ammonite territory, site unknown (4 Rom. m. fr. Heshbon Euseb. :Onom. 253, 33; cf. Buhl:Geogr. 266);— Ju Jdg 11:33 (LXX a)/xriv )Arnw/n, A ei)v Semweiq, LXXL Semeneiq); ´[[חִטֵּי מ]] Ez Eze 27:17 wheat of Minnîth (cf. wheat fr. Ammon 2Ch 27:5) so Berthol, but dub.; Co conj. [[חִטִּים]] [[וּנְכאׁת]] wheat and storax.
